name: Polo shirt
description: Polo shirts are casual and versatile garments. They can be worn in any season, from fall to spring. The polo shirt is an essential piece of any man's wardrobe.

name: Dress for lady
description: This dress is made of a light and airy fabric that will feel like a cloud on your skin. It has a loose, romantic shape with flowing sleeves and a draping back. The front has a band of lace that runs across the bodice and then falls down the side of the dress. The lace band also has a ruffle in the center, with a delicate floral pattern.

name: Supermer bag
description: There is nothing quite like the feeling of carrying a tote bag. It is the perfect bag for everyday use. It is lightweight and the straps are made of soft and durable fabric. The main compartment is spacious and can hold up to 10 pounds. The zippers are smooth and glide effortlessly.

name: Short Jean
description: Jean is a woman in her early 30s who loves to cook. She is married to a man in his early 40s and they have a 2-year-old son. Jean spends her days cooking, cleaning, and taking care of her family. When Jean goes to the grocery store, she feels the need to make the whole house smell like whatever she's cooking. In her new cookbook, the author shares recipes for homemade sprays, rubs, and spices that make food taste better and the house smell fantastic. Jean will use these recipes to make everything from condiments to desserts to a unique house scent.

name: Supremer Shirt
description: The Supremer shirt is a short sleeve button-down shirt that is made with a breathable, lightweight fabric. The shirt features a traditional collar, front and back yoke, and side slits. The Supremer shirt is available in a variety of colors, including charcoal, red, navy, and black.

name: Long Hand Shirt
description: This men's shirt is a long-sleeve shirt with a button up collar. It has a stylish design on the front and is made of a soft, cotton-like fabric. It is a light, summer weight shirt that would be comfortable in the heat.

name: Red T Shirt
description: If you are looking for a red shirt, then you should definitely look into this shirt. It is made of a light-weight material and has a perfect fit. This shirt is not only perfect for any occasion, but is also perfect for anyone that likes to wear a red shirt.

name: Hand-held Bag
description: Briefcase with a handle and a strap. This bag is a popular item for the office, school, or travel.

name: Short Skirt
description: A short skirt is a skirt with a hemline that ends just below the knees or the hemline that ends above the knees. They are typically made from fabrics such as cotton, polyester, or denim. Short skirts are usually a size or two smaller than the size of a normal skirt.

name: Helmet
description: There are many kinds of helmets to choose from. They vary from full face helmets, to half helmets, to open face helmets, to non-face helmets. Full face helmets provide the most protection and are the most expensive. Half helmets provide less protection and are less expensive. Open face helmets are not protective and are cheaper.

name: Short skirt dress
description: This dress has a gorgeous floral print with a matching belt and skirt. The belt is perfect for any waistline, and the skirt can be worn with or without the belt. The dress is easy to dress up or down and can be worn with any type of heel.

name: White and short dress
description: An elegant white, short, elegant dress. It is a beautiful and simple piece that looks perfect with a simple belt and some boots.

name: Laptop Bag
description: This laptop bag is a lightweight and durable canvas bag. It has a unique design with a retro style, making it perfect for any occasion. The bag comes with a single zipper closure, a detachable shoulder strap, and a padded laptop sleeve. The bag is also lined with a faux suede material to protect your belongings from scratches and scuffs.

name: Short Jean
description: Jean shorts are a simple and elegant piece of clothing. They are most often paired with a t-shirt, tank top, or long sleeve shirt. They can be worn with a belt, or with a wide leg pant. They are a comfortable, simple piece of clothing.

name: Shirt Premium
description: The shirt premium is an experience. It's a moment where your sense of smell and taste is flooded with a new scent. A few seconds later, the world around you is washed in that fragrance. A moment of blissful clarity. You feel it. You taste it. You see it.
